works.description:
Hello,

I am an agency of Kurousa-P, a Japanese music composer.
A blogspot.com user named Motoko uploaded a mistranslation of his song  
against Kurousa-P's will.

Motoko's profile: http://www.blogger.com/profile/05871054973021741476

1. I am a native Japanese who have the full command of both Japanese and  
English languages.

2. My client Kurousa-P released the song Akahitoha and uploaded it on the  
Japanese video sharing site Nico Nico Douga on Feb.29, 2008 and on May.26,  
2009.
2008 version: http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm2465784
2009 version: http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm7155972

3. I translated the song with the assist of Kurousa-P on May of 2011 and  
uploaded it on YouTube on May.25, 2011 and May.28, 2011.
2008 version: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G-qkOhDNfq0
2009 version: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wOqgwfxUtoc

4. I reproduced the song by permission of Kurousa-P.

5. You can confirm the accurate translation of this song by the YouTube  
links above.

6. Motoko posted a grave mistranslation that nullified the original lyrics  
against Kurousa-P's will on blogspot.com on Dec.24, 2009.
